name: Resize Runner
description:
Made in 7 days for Major Jam 3.

A fast paced arcade platformer with size changing mechanics. Shrink or grow yourself depending on the jump you have to make.

  • Shrinking yourself allows you to run much faster than normal, but you can't jump very high.
  • Growing yourself allows you to jump insane heights, but you move extremely slow.
  • Keep your original size and you will have the ability to jump off of walls.
